message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to you. While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a significant discount considering the potential value, and I'm confident you'll find this to be a worthwhile investment. Please let me know if you're interested.
